More information about text formats

Filtered HTML

  • Allowed HTML tags: <a> <blockquote> <br> <cite> <code> <dd> <dl> <dt> <em> <li> <ol> <p> <span> <strong> <ul>
    Allowed Style properties: font-size, font-size-adjust, font-style, font-weight
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.

Plain text

  • No HTML tags allowed.
  • Web page addresses and e-mail addresses turn into links automatically.
  • Lines and paragraphs break automatically.
